mapper.select: select rz, w, ptno from ST_ZVARL_B z, (select top 1 MSTM from ST_ZVARL_B where STCD = #{stcd} and #{date} >= MSTM order by MSTM desc) n where 1=1 and z.STCD = #{stcd} and z.MSTM = n.MSTM order by z.PTNO asc

select (select RZ from ST_RSVR_R where stcd = #{stcd} and tm = #{date}) as rz, (select top 1 otq from ST_RSVR_R where stcd = #{stcd} and #{date} >= tm and otq is not null order by tm desc) as oq, (select top 1 fsltdz from ST_RSVRFSR_B where stcd = #{stcd} and #{monthDay} >= bgmd and edmd >= #{monthDay} order by actyr desc) as lim, (select top 1 fsltdz from ST_RSVRFSR_B where stcd = #{stcd} order by actyr desc, fsltdz desc) as lim_bk
